resources.string: %1$s is a fast and lightweight browser produced by %2$s. Our mission is to foster a healthy, open internet.
%2$s strives to collect only what we need to provide and improve %1$s for everyone.
Find an app that can open link
None of the apps on your device are able to open this link. You can leave %1$s to search %2$s for an app that can.
Make sure you are connected to the internet
You might need to install other software to open this address.
A browser made by %1$s, the non-profit committed to a free and open web.
Use turbo mode to block tracking ads so you can browse at blazing speeds. If sites seem broken, just tap off the turbo mode switch in the menu.
Save on data costs by blocking tracking ads. Save even more when you enable image blocking.
Take screenshot of an entire page scroll. Read it offline without using data or tap it to revisit the web page.
Browse without a trace, and block a wide range of common web trackers by default. Ensure the security of your confidential data.
Just one flip, keep yourself updated with the “%1$s” - a variety of contents from the most popular topics to the hottest deals. %2$s
Now you can check how many trackers are blocked in private mode.
With the evolved product, we bring you a newly refreshed %1$s, with new name and new logo.
1. Multitask by opening %s at the same time!
2. Access your favorite sites quickly by %s
adding them to the home screen!
You can now pin any top site so it does not get moved. To get you started, we have pinned some top sites for you to try.
Location not available. Give permission to access your location.
Storage not available. Give permission to store photos and files on your device.

on the menu to capture\nan entire web page.

To make Firefox Lite better for you and everyone, we made some changes to our privacy policy. Tap to learn more.
Thank you for choosing our product. Your feedback is important to us.
- Fast and lightweight\n- Data saving\n- Powerful screenshots

%1$s is free and open source software made by %2$s and other contributors.
%1$s is made available to you under the terms of the %3$s and other open source licenses.
You are not granted any rights or licenses to the trademarks of the Mozilla Foundation or any party, including the %3$s, %4$s or %1$s names or logos. Additional information may be found here.
Additional source code for %1$s is available under various other free and open source licenses.
%1$s also uses blocklists provided by Disconnect, Inc. as separate and independent works under the GNU General Public License v3, and available here.

Your private browsing\nhistory has been erased.
Access private mode in one click! Want to add private mode shortcut to homescreen?

You can add private mode shortcut later in settings.

To improve your product experience, we collect information about your screenshots’ categories.
Compare prices across many online stores with Smart Shopping Search.

Compare prices across many online stores with Smart Shopping Search.
Tap the shopping sites below to browse more results, or tap this button to edit.
Fast access to your favourite games
Press to create a shortcut to your home screen.
I’m playing a really cool game. Check it out!\n%1$s
Remain Fast and Lightweight. We added smart shopping search and content to make internet browsing more fun and enjoyable!
Tap to read the trendy news, find good deals or play the hottest free games to have fun!
Tap to read the trendy news or play the hottest free games to have fun!
Tap to play the hottest free games to have fun!
Comparing prices across different online stores is super easy, try it now!

Now you can browse privately, no history, no passwords recorded and other people who use this device won’t see your activity.\n\nOur Advanced Private Browsing can even prevent you from being tracked by advertisers and websites, which most private modes cannot.
Try Shopping, News, Game everyday to win %1$s
Try Shopping, News, Game for 7 days in a row!
Try Shopping, News, Game on %1$s Home by simply clicking the buttons for seven days in a row.
Use your Firefox account to redeem your reward
Enter your email address to get started. Make sure you sign in to the account you want to use before you complete your redemption.
By clicking “I’m In!” you are agreeing to our Terms of Use
